summary: This is a Sword I made, it is very animeic.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a new sword to skyrim, a random Anime sword, This is my first mod ever, so I would love your feedback, any suggestions and ideas. If you find any major screw-ups, like the hilt please help me, I hope with your help I can improve and make higher quality mods.
 
Installation: Copy the ESP, into your skyrim data folder
-go to data\\meshes\\weapons and create a folder named Anime Sword, copy the Nif files into there
-go to data\\textures\\weapons and create a folder named Anime Sword, copy the dds files into there

Forging- You will find this sword in the Daedric section of the forge you will need,
1 Wisp Wrapping
1 Juniper Berry
3 Moonstone Ingot

Tempering- go to a sharpening stone and you will need,
2 Moonstone Ingot
author: blarghmeow
